data.title: Concord Offices
data.meta_description: Concord is the parent company of Concord Records, Fantasy Records, Fearless Records, Loma Vista Recordings, Rounder Records, Kidz Bop, Craft Recordings, Stax Records, Boosey & Hawkes, Rodgers & Hammerstein, Samuel French and Tams-Witmark.
